bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Cryptographic Protection of Data on Block-Oriented Storage Devices
IEEE Draft Standard for Cryptographic Protection of Data on Block-Oriented Storage Devices
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Approved Draft Std P1619/D18, Oct 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies cryptographic transform and key archival methods for protection of data in sector-level storage devices.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
